description:
The Law Offices of Gregory Reynald Williams, PLLC, in Durham, North Carolina, offers a wide range of legal services to a diverse base of clients. Currently serving clients in Wake, Durham, as well as surrounding counties, our law firm represents individuals, families, small-business owners and athletes who have legal needs related to any of the following practice areas:

  • Personal injury
  • Workersâ€™ compensation
  • Estate planning and administration, including wills, trusts, powers of attorney, health care directives and probate
  • Civil litigation
  • Small-business legal services
  • Legal matters affecting professional, amateur and student athletes
  • Traffic

When attorney Gregory Reynald Williams founded our law firm, he did so with a mission to provide the highest level of legal service possible to our clients. A North Carolina native, Mr. Williams genuinely cares about the legal matters that affect the citizens of our state. By working closely with you, he can devise effective solutions tailored to your specific needs and goals while advocating for your best interests.

For dependable, effective representation from an attorney you can trust, look no further than The Law Offices of Gregory Reynald Williams, PLLC. To find out more, you can contact our law firm to schedule a free initial consultation.
